Funds

This section shows your Funds related information.

To access it, Goto Menu - > Funds. The sections show the below information in a glance

  1. Ledger Balance
    • Today’s Balance
    • Today’s Pay -In - Today’s deposit value
    • Today’s PayOut - Today’s withdrawn value
    • DP Charges - Depository Charges
    • CFS (Credit for Sell)- This value is today’s Sell Holding Benefit
  2. Future Bill Cr/Dr - This value gives unsettled bill amount
  3. Margin Against Assets
    • Early PayIn - 80% of the Sell Holding Value of your Holding given to user on T+1 day
    • Margin Against Holding - Margin received on pledging of stocks, MF, etc
  4. Margin Utilized - This value is summation of M2M, Booked Loss, Margin required for Open positions, Margin Required for pending positions
  5. Available for Trading - This value is summation of Ledger Balance - Future Bill Dr + Margin Against Assets - Margin Utilized.

How to Deposit or Withdraw Funds

  1. Deposit

    Tapping DEPOSIT will bring up the Pay-in page. Below information needs to be entered

    1. AMOUNT – Enter the amount
    2. TRANSFER MODE – Select from UPI or Net Banking
    3. UPI ID - Enter UPI ID and Tap VERIFY
    4. Bank Details - > Select the Bank you’d like to transfer from. Your default selected account will be shown unless you want to change it
    5. Tap DEPOSIT

    Process via UPI

    Process via Net Banking

  2. For NEFT or RTGS

    Use the 'Do you want to opt for NEFT/RTGS?' Press 'Click Here'

    This will open up the page showing the details of Choice Broking’s bank account details for Equity / Commodity for NEFT / RTGS transfer.

    Important Note:- After you make the deposit, please the below details to b.accounts@choiceindia.com for us to track the transaction:

    1. Client Name & Mobile Number
    2. Client ID
    3. Segment (Equity/Commodity)
    4. Deposited Amount
    5. Deposit reference number in case of RTGS/NEFT
    6. Cheque Deposit slip & Cheque Copy in case of cheque deposit
    Note:- The amount will only be credited into your account once the transaction is verified
  3. Withdraw
    1. Enter the amount
    2. Default bank will be selected. Change from here if you’d like to send to some other account (Only applicable if you have mapped multiple banks with your Demat A/c)
    3. Tap WITHDRAW
    Note: You will receive an acknowledgement SMS and email from Choice FinX. It takes T+2 days for the amount to be credited into your account.
